sentences.english: Bosom 18 Ban military skill, can Heaven enter land, possess high-tech weapon.
sentences.chinese: 身懷十八般武藝，能上天入地，擁有高科技的武器。

sentences.english: Zhao is much simpler, excellent fighting skills and a loyal heart.
sentences.chinese: 這次的趙子龍似乎簡單的多，一身好武藝，一片忠心。

sentences.english: Well for three times eat good water, from the three high skills.
sentences.chinese: 井淘三遍喫好水，人從三師武藝高。

sentences.english: By the way, could you introduce me something about the 18 kinds of wushu weapons?
sentences.chinese: 對了，你能給我介紹一下什麼是十八般武藝嗎？

sentences.english: The intercourse between the folk martial arts and military martial arts promotes the martial arts' development.
sentences.chinese: 民間習武與軍事武藝的雙向交流促進了武術的發展。

sentences.english: The first ever to master the thousand scrolls of kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 他是有史以來第一個學會了師傅千般武藝的徒弟。

sentences.english: Fuller clock drilling, and finally out of a training extraordinary boy.
sentences.chinese: 恆景廢寢忘食苦練，終於練出了一身非凡的武藝。

definition: when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
Chinese boxing/fist and feet/punching and kicking
